Text saved: Today, a lot of business happens between different countries. Most business people all over the world speak English. But the rules for talking in business are very different in different cultures. If you do not understand these rules, it can cause problems. You might think bad things that are not true. You might not understand each other. Etiquette means the polite rules for how to act with other people. Here are three simple differences in business etiquette around the world. This can help you when you work with someone from a different culture.
